Text:
@ sinner77

Ritwik Ghatak er baki 5 ta film + Suchitra Sen er classic gulo jato taratari debo ! (except new releases ! + 1-2 adult chara, public demand, he he he ! ) because i'm in a great hurry ! karon ache ! pare balbo !

sinner77,koustoov,saurabhrock chara baki karur kathar jabab debo na thik karechi !

sinner77, ekhane movie up karte giye bujlam kano bangali ra eto pichiye gache ! samosto jaygay ! international level to anek durer bapyar sarbo bharotio khetrye o amar pratidin pichiye jabo ! aro pichiye parbo ! karon amader kankra sulov monobritti ! jato din amader eai mentality problem ta thak be tato din unnotir kono abokash nei ! eta sattyi je tumi ar koustoov na thakle ami ar up kortam na !

Are baba kader janyo up karte jawa ? eto kosto kare rip + watermark + kata + jora --- anek samay lage bhai ! tarpar matro 4-5 ghanta ghumiye  alarm diye kono mate ghum theke uthe eto pressure niye tomader kato gulo bhalo movie upohar debar chesta karchi seta amar dosh ? kato apobad na sunlam !

Jai hok ami chesta karbo roj raat 2 tor theke ghum bhenge uthe parte ! khub kasto habe tabu chesta karbo ! tomar je samsto movie request ache sab list kare amar last 2 to post e likhe dao ! jato taratari segulo tomake up kare debo ! abar balchi i'm in a hurry ! tai tomar requested film gulo taratari diye jete chai ! 

Ebong Subho Mahalaya bandhu ! bhalo theko !
